revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Technologic Systems |model=TS-8150 |revision=-4600 Rev. B |est_release_date=05/2014 |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer,wired embedded board, |pwr_v=5-28 |pwr_conn=Molex (2-pin) |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX283;MCIMX286CVM4B; |cpu1_cspeed=454 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q064A |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Memphis |ram1_model=MEM2G16D2DABG-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=yes |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6020 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=CPLD;Altera;EPM240T100C5N;;1;,,, FPGA w/ 5K LUTs;Lattice;LXFP2-5E;;1;,,, 5V RS-232 Transceiver;MaxLinear;SP213E;;1;,,, Microprocessor Reset Circuit;ST Micro;STM1001;;1;,,, Half-Duplex RS-485 Transceiver;Exar Corp;SP485E;;1;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/ 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74ACT245;;1;,,, RTC with Embedded Temperature Sensor;Renesas;ISL12020M;;1;,,, 42V Constant On-Time PFET Buck Switching Controller;TI;LM25085;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8016;;3;,,, Dual Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Inputs;ON Semi;NC7WZ14;;2;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/ 3-State Output;NXP;74LVC244A;;2;,,, D-Type Flip-Flop w/ Preset and Clear;ON Semi;NC7SZ74;;1;,,, 10-bit High Speed CMOS Bus Switch;IDT;IDTQS3861;;1;,,, 8-input 3 State Multiplexer;NXP;74HC251;;1;,,, SPDT Analog Switch;ON Semi;NC7SB3157;;2;,,, Two-Input NOR Gate;ON Semi;NC7SZ02;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery backup, LCD, I2C, SPI, temperature sensor |stock_os=Linux;2.6.35.3; }} {{TagLine|PC/104 TS-Socket Embedded Computer}} :[https://www.embeddedarm.com/products/TS-8150-4600 Product page] ===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedarm.com/TS-8150-4600 ''Baseboard Documentation''] â€¢ [https://www.embeddedarm.com/images/boards/medium/?C=N;O=A PCB images] *[https://docs.embeddedarm.com/TS-4600 ''Computer-on-Module Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedarm ''Code Respository''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX283 @454MHz :MCIMX286 (MCIMX286CVM4B) ARM9 SoC *RAM: 128MB or 256MB (DDR2) *Storage: 8MB (NOR) Flash *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports ==Images== ---- __NOTOC__
